MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the WA5 postcode area of Warrington. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further investigations are required due to a fault on the underground cable network and specialist teams are required to assist to investigate and repair the fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:57 AM on Monday, 22 February 2021.
